Title: YUIAsp.Net - Yahoo! UI Library YUI controls for ASP.NET Ajax
Description: Highly customizable, easy to use, fast Yahoo! UI Library (YUI) controls designed to work with Microsoft Ajax Extensions.

Project Description
Highly customizable, easy to use, fast Yahoo! UI Library (YUI) controls designed to work with Microsoft Ajax Extensions.

The RC2 release is finally here.



Version
  • .NET Framework 3.5
  • Yahoo! UI Library 2.6.0

We offer
  • Tight integration with MS Ajax Framework, with both server side and client side functionality.
  • Embedded scripts(debug & minified versions) with option to disable it per control or globally for all controls in your website.
  • Embedded skins for a great out-of-the-box user experience with option to disable it globally for all controls in your website.
  • Quick example website
  • Clean, commented code

The next release will contain
  • Improved themes support
  • Integration with YUI 2.7.0

You might also be interested in the SharpPieces project
